column1: HIGHLIGHTS•Two new Member States (Mexico and San Marino) reported cases of COVID-19 in the past 24 hours.•WHO has published the Rational use of personal protective equipment forCOVID-19.ThisdocumentsummarizesWHOrecommendationsfortheappropriate use of personal protective equipment (PPE) in health care andcommunity settings, including the handling of cargo. More information onInfection Prevention and Control (IPC) activities can be found in the Subject inFocus.
